response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We believe its worth far surpasses $1,000,000, but we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This exceptional opportunity allows you to acquire a masterpiece that could potentially revolutionize your world. We trust that you will appreciate its true value and consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 950000}
